value: I'm from a small town in Canada called Cut Knife, Saskatchewan. Besides my passion for programming, I enjoy squash, volleyball, snowboarding, wakeboarding, laying around reading a great book, or simply spending time with friends. I'm a pretty enthusiastic sports fan and really enjoy going to hockey and football games.

I'm also really passionate about volunteering. I was the Vice President Finance for the University of Alberta Engineering Students' Society for two years. The society represents all engineering students at the university. Before that I was a Vice President for the Computer Engineering Club.
